import React from 'react' import { Table} from 'react-bootstrap' import { UseSelector, useSelector } from 'react-redux/es/hooks/useSelector' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export const TicketTable= ({}) => { const {tickets , isLoading , error} =useSelector ((state) => state.tickets) return ( {tickets.length ? tickets.map(row=> ): }
# subjects Status Opened Date
{row._id} {row.subject} {row.status} {row.openedDate}
no ticket show
) }
